revised_title: Awards and Achievements in Science: Royal Society Honorees of 1968
tldr: The article highlights the accomplishments of various scientists honored by the Royal Society in 1968. Honorees include T. Reichstein, D. Gabor, M. F. Atiyah, W. T. J. Morgan, Sir Gilbert Roberts, J. W. Cornforth, G. J. Popjak, Sir Maurice Yonge, and F. J. Dyson. Their contributions span fields such as chemistry, mathematics, physics, biology, and engineering.
